gurmukhi: krI bwx brKM ]BrXo sYn hrKM ]hxy bwx qwxM ]iJxXo kuMB kwxM ]439]
transliteration: Karibaan Barakhannd|| Bdaryo Sain Harakhannd|| Hane Baan Taanan|| Jhinyo Kounbh Kaanan||439||
translation: Both his legs cracked and from them came out the continuous flow of blood. Ram saw and shot an arrow, which killed Kumbhkaran.439.

gurmukhi: Bey dyv hrKM ]krI puhp brKM ]suxXo lMk nwQM ]hxy BUm mwQM ]440]
transliteration: Bhae Dev Harakhannd|| Karipuhap Barakhannd|| Sounyo Lank Naathan|| Hane Bhoom Maathan||440||
translation: In their joy she gods showered floweres. When Ranvana the king of Lanka, heard this news, he, in great anguish, threw his head on the earth.440.

gurmukhi: ieiq sRI bicqR nwtky rwmvqwr kuMBkrn bDih DXwie smwpqm squ ]
transliteration: It(i) Sribachitra Naatke Raamavtaar Kounbhkaran Badhah(i) Dhyaae Samaaptam Sat(u)||
translation: End on the Chapter entitled ‘The Killing of Kumbhkaran’ in Ramavtar in BACHHITTAR NATAK
Now begins the description of the war with Trimund :

gurmukhi: pTXo qIn muMfM ]clXo sYn JuMfM ]kiRqI icqR joDI ]mMfy prm kRoDI ]441]
transliteration: Pathyo Teen Mounndan|| Chadyo Sain Jhoundan|| Kritichitra Jodhee|| Mande Param Krodhee||441||
translation: Now Ravana sent the demon Trimund who marched at the head of the army; that warriors was unique like a portrait and a demon of supreme fury.441.

gurmukhi: bkYN mwr mwrM ]qjY bwx DwrM ]hnUmMq kopy rxM pwie ropy ]442]
transliteration: Bakain Maar Maaran|| Tajai Baan Dhaaran|| Hanoomant Kope|| Ranan Paae Rope||442||
translation: He shouted “Kill, Kill” and discharged a current of arrows, with great rage Hanuman stood with a firm foot in the battlefield.442.

gurmukhi: AsM CIn lIno ]iqsI kMiT dIno ]hnXo Kst nYxM ]hsy dyv gYxM ]443]
transliteration: Asan Chheen Leeno|| Tisikanth(i) Deeno|| Hanyo Khast Nainan|| Hase Dev Gadnan||443||
translation: Hanuman seized the sword of that demon and with the same he gave a blow on his neck. That six-eyed demon was killed, seeing whom the gods smiled in the sky.443.

gurmukhi: ieiq sRI bicqR nwtk rwmvqwr qiRmuMf bDh DXwie smwpqm squ ]
transliteration: It(i) Sribachitra Naatak Raamavtaar Trimounnd Badhah Dhyaae Samaaptam Sat(u)||
translation: End on the Chapter entitled ‘The Killing of Trimund’ in Ramavtar in BACHITTAR NATAK.
Now begin the description of the war with the minister Mahodar :

gurmukhi: suxXo lMk nwQM ]Duxy srb mwQM ]krXo m`d pwxM ]Bry bIr mwxM ]444]
transliteration: Sounyo Lank Naathan|| Dhoune Sarab Maathan|| Daryo Madd Paanan|| Bhare Beer Maanan||444||
translation: When Ravana heard the news about the destruction of his warriors he held his forehead in extreme anguish. (In order to forget his agony), he in his pride drank wine.444.
